alert.label: Alert
alert.description: Standardized notifications for potential security incidents or anomalies requiring attention.

asset.label: Asset Management
asset.description: Defines the categorization and attributes of hardware, software, and digital resources within a network.

device_detection.label: Device Detection
device_detection.description: Identifies and categorizes devices connected to a network for security monitoring and threat detection.

incident.label: Incident
incident.description: Records and details of security breaches or cyber attacks, including detection, response, and resolution.

log.label: Log Data
log.description: Records of events and activities for monitoring, analysis, and forensic investigation in cybersecurity.
